__TOC__

This page is dedicated to Ubuntu participation at Fosdem 2012

If you are somebody contributing to Ubuntu in any way (ranging from providing support on your locoteam forum or IRC channel, to being a core developer), please register your attendance <nowiki>[[Fosdem-2012#Ubuntu_Developers.2C_Contributors.2C_etc.|below]]</nowiki>!

== Ubuntu Booth ==

Contact person: Jan Claeys (JanC) from ubuntu-be.

What we will have at the booth:
* Stuff to sell?
** T-shirts (Ubuntu-BE + some leftover official Ubuntu/Kubuntu t-shirts)
** Goodies Ubuntu-FR (stickers and french CD)
* Stuff to give away?
** Ubuntu/Kubuntu/Server CDs
** Flyers
* Hardware / software / other equipment
** table cloth (ubuntu-be)
** Ubuntu banner (ubuntu-be)
** Ubuntu roll-up (ubuntu-be) x2
** lanyards & paper labels to put your name/nick onâ€”come ask for one! (ubuntu-be)
** power extension cords (JanC)
** 5 ports 10/100 switch (Zergy)
*** there will be no wired internet at the booth, but may be useful to provide internet to somebody who has no (working) wireless?
* Anybody has something cool to show or demo?
** Saviq from #ubuntu-tv said he/she would look if some Ubuntu TV hardware can be used at the booth, but if anybody else has a working Ubuntu-TV setup to show off...
** ... something else?

== Ubuntu Dinner ==

We will also organize an Ubuntu dinner on Saturday evening. Details and a list to subscribe will be available at the Ubuntu booth on Saturday (we will probably have to confirm somewhere during the afternoon, so please put your name on the list early on Saturday if you can!).

== Ubuntu Developers, Contributors, etc. ==

It's quite common for upstream developers & developers from other distros to ask us at the Ubuntu booth if $UBUNTU_DEVELOPER_X or $AN_UBUNTU_DEVELOPER_FAMILIAR_WITH_Y is at FOSDEM, and often we don't know the answer.  Because of that, it would be cool if Ubuntu developers who come to FOSDEM could somehow list when/where they can be found during FOSDEM...

Of course, if you give a talk, please also mention this in the appropriate section!
